Articles.Content:
Thank you for the wonderful fun game. I purchased it today when I saw that I could send some money over.

Can you please add a moon, that's my only request.

Keep up the grate work and thank you for so many fun hours, and enjoyment using your software.

Chad.

Hello there!

Firstly, we have a search function here on the forum. It is on the top, right corner or at this location. Please search for 'moon' and you'll see that this is not the first time anyone requested a moon.

Secondly, have fun at one of the spaciest communitys of the world
